db:abstract.db:para: The QQmlError class encapsulates a QML error.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: QQmlError includes a textual description of the error, as well as location information (the file, line, and column). The toString() method creates a single-line, human-readable string containing all of this information, for example:
db:section.db:programlisting: file:///home/user/test.qml:7:8: Invalid property assignment: double expected
db:section.db:para: You can use qDebug(), qInfo(), or qWarning() to output errors to the console. This method will attempt to open the file indicated by the error and include additional contextual information.
db:section.db:programlisting: file:///home/user/test.qml:7:8: Invalid property assignment: double expected y: "hello" ^

db:section.db:title: QQmlError::QQmlError()
db:section.db:para: Creates an empty error object.

db:section.db:title: QQmlError::QQmlError(const QQmlError &other)
db:section.db:para: Creates a copy of other.

db:section.db:title: int QQmlError::column() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the error column number.

db:section.db:title: QString QQmlError::description() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the error description.

db:section.db:title: bool QQmlError::isValid() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if this error is valid, otherwise false.

db:section.db:title: int QQmlError::line() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the error line number.

db:section.db:title: QtMsgType QQmlError::messageType() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the message type.

db:section.db:title: QObject *QQmlError::object() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the nearest object where this error occurred. Exceptions in bound property expressions set this to the object to which the property belongs. It will be 0 for all other exceptions.

db:section.db:title: void QQmlError::setColumn(int column)
db:section.db:para: Sets the error column number.

db:section.db:title: void QQmlError::setDescription(const QString &description)
db:section.db:para: Sets the error description.

db:section.db:title: void QQmlError::setLine(int line)
db:section.db:para: Sets the error line number.

db:section.db:title: void QQmlError::setMessageType(QtMsgType messageType)
db:section.db:para: Sets the messageType for this message. The message type determines which QDebug handlers are responsible for receiving the message.

db:section.db:title: void QQmlError::setObject(QObject *object)
db:section.db:para: Sets the nearest object where this error occurred.

db:section.db:title: void QQmlError::setUrl(const QUrl &url)
db:section.db:para: Sets the url for the file that caused this error.

db:section.db:title: QString QQmlError::toString() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the error as a human readable string.

db:section.db:title: QUrl QQmlError::url() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the url for the file that caused this error.

db:section.db:title: QQmlError &QQmlError::operator=(const QQmlError &other)
db:section.db:para: Assigns other to this error object.

db:section.db:title: QDebug operator<<(QDebug debug, const QQmlError &error)
db:section.db:para: Outputs a human readable version of error to debug.
